content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'EFF_CSV_Header') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [EFF_CSV_Header] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
			 FIRST_ROW = 2
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'synapsedvdemo_synapsedvdemo_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [synapsedvdemo_synapsedvdemo_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://synapsedvdemo@synapsedvdemo.dfs.core.windows.net', 
		TYPE = HADOOP 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE superheroes_nlp_dataset (
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[real_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[full_name] nvarchar(4000),
	[overall_score] nvarchar(4000),
	[history_text] nvarchar(4000),
	[powers_text] nvarchar(4000),
	[intelligence_score] bigint,
	[strength_score] bigint,
	[speed_score] bigint,
	[durability_score] bigint,
	[power_score] bigint,
	[combat_score] bigint,
	[superpowers] nvarchar(4000),
	[alter_egos] nvarchar(4000),
	[aliases] nvarchar(4000),
	[place_of_birth] nvarchar(4000),
	[first_appearance] nvarchar(4000),
	[creator] nvarchar(4000),
	[alignment] nvarchar(4000),
	[occupation] nvarchar(4000),
	[base] nvarchar(4000),
	[teams] nvarchar(4000),
	[relatives] nvarchar(4000),
	[gender] nvarchar(4000),
	[type_race] nvarchar(4000),
	[height] nvarchar(4000),
	[weight] nvarchar(4000),
	[eye_color] nvarchar(4000),
	[hair_color] nvarchar(4000),
	[skin_color] nvarchar(4000),
	[img] nvarchar(4000),
	[has_electrokinesis] float,
	[has_energy_constructs] float,
	[has_mind_control_resistance] float,
	[has_matter_manipulation] float,
	[has_telepathy_resistance] float,
	[has_mind_control] float,
	[has_enhanced_hearing] float,
	[has_dimensional_travel] float,
	[has_element_control] float,
	[has_size_changing] float,
	[has_fire_resistance] float,
	[has_fire_control] float,
	[has_dexterity] float,
	[has_reality_warping] float,
	[has_illusions] float,
	[has_energy_beams] float,
	[has_peak_human_condition] float,
	[has_shapeshifting] float,
	[has_heat_resistance] float,
	[has_jump] float,
	[has_self-sustenance] float,
	[has_energy_absorption] float,
	[has_cold_resistance] float,
	[has_magic] float,
	[has_telekinesis] float,
	[has_toxin_and_disease_resistance] float,
	[has_telepathy] float,
	[has_regeneration] float,
	[has_immortality] float,
	[has_teleportation] float,
	[has_force_fields] float,
	[has_energy_manipulation] float,
	[has_endurance] float,
	[has_longevity] float,
	[has_weapon-based_powers] float,
	[has_energy_blasts] float,
	[has_enhanced_senses] float,
	[has_invulnerability] float,
	[has_stealth] float,
	[has_marksmanship] float,
	[has_flight] float,
	[has_accelerated_healing] float,
	[has_weapons_master] float,
	[has_intelligence] float,
	[has_reflexes] float,
	[has_super_speed] float,
	[has_durability] float,
	[has_stamina] float,
	[has_agility] float,
	[has_super_strength] float
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Data/kaggle_superhero/superheroes_nlp_dataset.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapsedvdemo_synapsedvdemo_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [EFF_CSV_Header]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM stage1.superheroes_nlp_dataset
GO
